meanings.definition: A type of ink used in screen printing.
meanings.sent1: The plastisol dried quickly on the t-shirt.
meanings.sent2: The artist mixed the plastisol with colors to create a design.
meanings.sent3: The plastisol ink decided to take a break and relax on the fabric.
meanings.sent4: The plastisol flowed smoothly onto the paper, like a colorful river.
meanings.sent5: The plastisol ink popped out vividly against the white background.

meanings.definition: A liquid form of PVC used in various applications.
meanings.sent1: The plastisol was poured into the mold to create a new toy.
meanings.sent2: The workers applied the plastisol coating to the metal surface.
meanings.sent3: The plastisol liquid giggled as it transformed into a solid shape.
meanings.sent4: The plastisol seemed to dance as it adhered to the surface.
meanings.sent5: The plastisol mixture shimmered under the bright lights of the factory.
